attributes.action: Stop all people called justin from using public transport between the hours of 6am to 10pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Its just not on, everywhere you look there is someone called Justin lurking about. They just hang around doing nothing useful being all Justin this and Justin that.

It must stop now.....

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
